name: Cutey Honey FX
summary: A Cutie Honey digital point-and-click comic adventure game for the PC-FX (Yes, it's spelt Cutey Honey FX on the box). Developed by DataWest, published by NEC. Of course it wouldn't be Cutey Honey without a good dose of naughtiness thrown in as well. It was released only in Japan in 1995.
